page.title: 06EDUCATION
page.content: {Milesmark Primary School} has 4 teachers and 70 children. The school was built in 1876 and is 109 years old. There are only 4 classrooms and a hall in the school. The children are all aged between 5 and 12 years old. We take part in many activities. There is a football team, a netball team and we take part in the district sports. A typical day for us at Milesmark would be to do some maths work, some handwriting, some reading activities, gym and project work. We get a bottle of milk just before interval and at interval the children serve in the school tuckshop. Most children go home for their lunch.
